ygData.subject: Re: Hammer quest for a cleric friend
ygData.msgSnippet: I am almost positive the dark elf Gix in West commons has something to do with this quest.  We are talking about the thex mallet aren t we? ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I am almost positive the dark elf Gix in West commons has something to do
with this quest. We are talking about the thex mallet aren't we?



-----Original Message-----
From: Zwanenburg, John <ZWANENJ@...>
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com' <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 12:09 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Hammer quest for a cleric friend


>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>
>
> Hey all,
>
> I know that ive asked this once before but i am gonna ask again, (
>ive got a bad memory) I was wondering if any of you knew about the quest
>involving the hammer peices found in Befallen (2 are found on the elf
>skeleton and the other is fond on Gynok) What i need to know is whom to
give
>these peices to in the clerics guild. Anyone have an idea? Oh im talking
>about the Dark Elf clerics guild by the way.
>
> Thanks
